nodes.text: Pig-face's boyfriend was a mysterious being encased entirely in plates of silvery armor with only a glass-encased brain and yellow-goggled eyes visible. He was in a relationship with a furry female individual, and the two were sometimes seen at Locru's Central Saloon. When Han Solo came into the saloon and found himself in a fight with Warto, the Corellian smuggler crashed into the table seating the silvery-armored humanoid and his girlfriend. Solo, not knowing that the gender of his girlfriend, insulted her, giving her the nickname "Pig-face". To pay Solo back for the insult, the boyfriend took a swing at the smuggler but missed.
